HealthState.description: State of health of the provider instance

SslPreference.description: Gets or sets certificate preference if secure communication is enabled.

JobConfigurationType.description: Gets or sets job configuration type.

AppServicePlanConfiguration.description: Configuration details of app service plan

capacity.description: The number of workers in app service plan. If this is not set or set to 0, auto scale will be configured for the app service plan, otherwise, instance count is set to this number.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of SAP monitors.

MonitorListResult.description: The response from the List SAP monitors operation.

Monitor.description: SAP monitor info on Azure (ARM properties and SAP monitor properties)

provisioningState.description: State of provisioning of the SAP monitor.

appLocation.description: The SAP monitor resources will be deployed in the SAP monitoring region. The subnet region should be same as the SAP monitoring region.

routingPreference.description: Sets the routing preference of the SAP monitor. By default only RFC1918 traffic is routed to the customer VNET.

zoneRedundancyPreference.description: Sets the preference for zone redundancy on resources created for the SAP monitor. By default resources will be created which do not support zone redundancy.

logAnalyticsWorkspaceArmId.description: The ARM ID of the Log Analytics Workspace that is used for SAP monitoring.

monitorSubnet.description: The subnet which the SAP monitor will be deployed in

msiArmId.description: The ARM ID of the MSI used for SAP monitoring.

storageAccountArmId.description: The ARM ID of the Storage account used for SAP monitoring.

MonitorProperties.description: Describes the properties of a SAP monitor.

UpdateMonitorRequest.description: Defines the request body for updating SAP monitor resource.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of provider instances.

ProviderInstanceListResult.description: The response from the List provider instances operation.

OracleProviderInstanceProperties.description: Gets or sets the Oracle provider properties.

hostname.description: Gets or sets the target virtual machine name.

dbName.description: Gets or sets the oracle database name.

dbPort.description: Gets or sets the oracle database sql port.

dbUsername.description: Gets or sets the oracle database user name.

dbPassword.description: Gets or sets the oracle database password.

dbPasswordUri.description: Gets or sets the key vault URI to secret with the database password.

sapSid.description: Gets or sets the SAP System Identifier

sslCertificateUri.description: Gets or sets the blob URI to SSL certificate for the Oracle Database.

value.description: The list of alerts of the SAP monitor resource.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of alert instances.

AlertsListResult.description: The response from the List alerts operation.

Alert.description: A alert associated with SAP monitor.

provisioningState.description: State of provisioning of the alert instance

templateName.description: Name of the alert template from which it was created.

alertRuleResourceId.description: ID of the alert rule resource created.

providerType.description: The provider type for alert. For example, the value can be SapHana.

providerNames.description: Name of provider instances associated with the alert.

AlertProperties.description: Describes the properties of a alert instance.

status.description: The value which indicates whether this scheduled query rule is enabled. Value should be enabled or disabled

severity.description: Severity of the alert. Should be an integer between [0-4]. Value of 0 is severest.

actionGroups.description: Action Group resource Ids to invoke when the alert fires

threshold.description: the criteria threshold value that activates the alert

windowSize.description: The period of time on which the Alert query will be executed

evaluationFrequency.description: How often the scheduled query rule is evaluated.

failingPeriodsToAlert.description: The number of failing periods to trigger an alert.

muteActionsDuration.description: Mute actions for the chosen period of time after the alert is fired

autoMitigate.description: The value that indicates whether the alert should be automatically resolved or not. The default is Disable.

dimension.description: Evaluation of metric on a particular column

AlertRuleProperties.description: Describes the properties of a alert.

name.description: The name of the alert query param.

value.description: The value of the alert query param.

AlertQueryParameter.description: Describes the Alert Query Parameter properties in alert.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of alert templates.

AlertTemplatesListResult.description: The response from the List alert templates operation.

AlertTemplate.description: A alert template associated with SAP monitor.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the alert template

templateDisplayName.description: Display name of the alert template.

providerType.description: The provider type for alert template. For example, the value can be SapHana.

description.description: Short Description of the alert template.

severity.description: Severity of the alert. Should be an integer between [0-4]. Value of 0 is most severe and value of 4 is least severe.

query.description: Query Associated with the Alert Template

thresholdOperator.description: Evaluation Operator for Alert Template Threshold.

defaultThreshold.description: Default Threshold Value Associated with the Alert Template

lowerBound.description: Minimum possible Default Threshold Value Associated with the Alert Template

upperBound.description: Maximum possible Default Threshold Value Associated with the Alert Template

defaultThresholdInputOption.description: Is input required for Default Threshold Value Associated with the Alert Template

alertUnit.description: Alert Unit Value Associated with the Alert Template

AlertTemplateProperties.description: Describes the properties of a alert template.

thresholdOperator.description: Threshold Operator for the alert template [Metric Measurement]

threshold.description: The Threshold Value Associated with the Alert Template for Metric Measurement

metricTriggerType.description: Metric Trigger Type Associated with the Alert Template for Metric Measurement

metricColumn.description: Metric Column Associated with the Alert Template for Metric Measurement

frequencyInMinutes.description: Frequency (mins) value Associated with the Alert Template for Metric Measurement

timeWindowInMinutes.description: Time Window (mins) Value Associated with the Alert Template for Metric Measurement

AlertTemplateMetricMeasurement.description: Describes the properties for metric measurement in alerts template.

type.description: Type of the Query Input Parameter

name.description: Name of the Query Input Parameter

description.description: Description of the Query Input Parameter

defaultValue.description: Default Value of the Query Input Parameter

laQuery.description: Query of the Query Input Parameter

selectionMode.description: Selection Mode of the Query Input Parameter

displayName.description: Display Name of the Query Input Parameter

AlertTemplateQueryInputParameter.description: Describes the Query Input Parameter properties in alerts template.
